claim: Futurama has merchandise that is related to it.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Following a commitment from 20th Century Fox Television to produce four straight-to-DVD Futurama films , Comedy Central announced on June 23 , 2006 that they were resurrecting the show and would air the films as new Futurama episodes  (  reconfiguring each film into four episodes  )  after each film 's DVD release .
